channel.title: Need Help/guide
channel.description: hi i have a server taht only i can play on by going 127.0.0.1 it has no features at all just items & the rs world to walk around. the client ive got isn't that good but just getting it to work with other people on it will be a start because i havn't done this b4.Is there guide to getting features like attacking & making it so other ppl can play? google dosn't help. also a guide to stat changing.
